confirmReload.message: This extension requires you to reload tabs after installing. Please reload the current tab.

welcomeMessage.message: Welcome! Please open a page in a new tab and click the Gyazo icon to start.

contextMenuSettingLabel.message: Show Gyazo options in the right click menu

copyUrlSupportSettingLabel.message: Copy Gyazo links to clipboard after uploading

fileSizeLimitHelpText.message: Files larger than this size will be compressed

pageScrollDelayHelpText.message: Please set to slow if captures have issues

selectTeamToLogin.message: Select the team to upload to on the extension's options page

loginToTeamsLink.message: You can switch to other teams after signing in to them
